translations: vi.幸灾乐祸；心满意足地注视
n.幸灾乐祸；贪婪的盯视；洋洋得意

phrs.translation: 得意, 幸灾乐祸, 满足的看
欣喜若狂, 幸灾乐祸
幸灾乐祸地看, 窃喜

sentences.sentence: In private, Tories gloat that the process may take perhaps 20 seats off Labour and all in the name of fairness.
sentences.translation: 私下里，托利党幸灾乐祸地认为，这一过程可能会让工党失去20个席位，而且都是以公平的名义。

sentences.sentence: It is easy for people to gloat when the cool jock with the hot girlfriend wrecks his sweet car, especially if he seems kind of smug.
sentences.translation: 当酷酷的运动员和火辣的女友撞坏了他的爱车时，人们很容易幸灾乐祸，尤其是当他看起来有点沾沾自喜的时候。

sentences.sentence: Today I write not to gloat.
sentences.translation: 今天我不是幸灾乐祸才写信。
